message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll take the majority, you get a smaller share, but it's still better than nothing!
I'll take a slightly bigger share, but still willing to compromise!
You took a bigger share last round, now it's my turn to adjust!
I'll try to take a bigger share again, but still willing to compromise!
You're getting more aggressive, so I'll take a firmer stance this time!

I'll take a big risk and try to get more, but I'm running out of time!
You're running out of time, and so am I. I'll take most of the remaining cash!
I'm out of options, I'll take nothing and hope for a better deal next time!
